new_skill_specs.name: extract_numerical_value_from_text
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract a specific numerical value from a given text, particularly when the text explicitly states the value.
edge_cases: Text contains multiple numbers, but only one is relevant.
Text includes numbers in different formats (e.g., spelled out, fractions).

tests.input: The average miles per gallon for a city bus is 6.5.
The bus gets 6.5 miles per gallon on average.
